results.description: Goals from Bryan Mbeumo, Kamohelo Mokotjo and Josh Dasilva lift Brentford into ninth in the Championship as they overcome Wigan.
results.shortTitle: Brentford cruise to victory at Wigan
results.title: Wigan Athletic 0-3 Brentford: Bees climb to ninth place

thumbnail.altText: Mbeumo has scored three times in his last five appearances

results.description: Huddersfield Town's resurgence under new manager Danny Cowley continues as they beat Brentford.
results.shortTitle: Grant goal extends Terriers' good run
results.title: Brentford 0-1 Huddersfield Town: Karlan grant extends Terriers' unbeaten run to seven games

results.description: The Football Association fine Brentford and Millwall £14,000 each over a melee in their Championship game on 19 October.
results.shortTitle: Brentford and Millwall fined by FA
results.title: Brentford and Millwall: FA fine clubs £14,000 each for failing to control players

results.description: Brentford beat west London rivals Queens Park Rangers to earn a third Championship victory in a row.
results.shortTitle: Brentford win at west London rivals QPR
results.title: Queens Park Rangers 1-3 Brentford: Ollie Watkins double gives Bees win

results.description: Brentford striker Nikos Karelis will be out for a "significant" time after suffering a "serious" knee injury.
results.title: Nikos Karelis: Brentford striker out with 'serious' knee injury

thumbnail.altText: Nikos Karelis in action for Brentford

results.description: Relive Brentford's Championship victory over QPR as the Bees make it three league wins in a row.
results.title: Relive Brentford's victory at rivals QPR

results.description: Brentford take advantage of Swansea City's poor home form to claim a comfortable Championship win.
results.title: Swansea 0-3 Brentford: Bees continue Swans' home struggles

results.description: The Football Association charge Brentford and Millwall over a melee that broke out late in Saturday's derby.
results.shortTitle: Brentford and Millwall charged by FA
results.title: Brentford and Millwall: FA charge London rivals after derby melee

results.description: Brentford's Danish defender Luka Racic agrees a four-year deal to stay at the club until 2023
results.title: Luka Racic: Brentford defender signs four-year contract

thumbnail.altText: Racic has been capped by Denmark at every level from U16 to U20

results.description: Brentford score three late goals to complete a dramatic turnaround against Millwall at Griffin Park.
results.shortTitle: Brentford stun Millwall with late goals
results.title: Brentford 3-2 Millwall: Bees stage stunning comeback late on

results.description: Brentford winger Sergi Canos faces a 'significant period' on the sidelines after suffering a serious knee injury.
results.title: Sergi Canos: Brentford winger suffers serious knee injury

thumbnail.altText: Sergi Canos in action for Brentford

results.description: Brentford winger Sergi Canos signs a new four-year contract, keeping him at the club until the summer of 2023.
results.title: Sergi Canos: Brentford winger signs new contract until 2023

thumbnail.altText: Sergi Canos in action for Brentford

results.description: Ben Watson's volleyed winner against Brentford moves Nottingham Forest up to second in the Championship table.
results.title: Nottingham Forest 1-0 Brentford: Watson's winners lifts Reds to second in Championship

thumbnail.altText: Nottingham Forest's Ben Watson celebrates his goal

results.description: Bristol City score a late equaliser at Brentford to extend their unbeaten run in the Championship to nine matches.
results.title: Brentford 1-1 Bristol City: Robins sting Bees with late Andreas Weimann equaliser

results.description: A hat-trick of headers from Ollie Watkins sees Brentford come from behind to win at Barnsley in the Championship.
results.shortTitle: Watkins treble for Brentford beats Tykes
results.title: Barnsley 1-3 Brentford: Ollie Watkins hat-trick ends poor away run for Bees

results.description: Relive Brentford's win at Barnsley in the Championship thanks to Ollie Watkins' hat-trick as it happened.
results.shortTitle: Championship: Relive Ollie Watkins' hat-trick as Brentford beat Barnsley
results.title: Championship live: Barnsley v Brentford

results.description: Stoke City move off the bottom of the Championship, but their 0-0 draw at Brentford does little to relieve the pressure on manager Nathan Jones.
results.shortTitle: Stoke off bottom after drab draw at Bees
results.title: Brentford 0-0 Stoke City: Potters off bottom of Championship after drab draw at Bees

results.description: Sean Maguire and Tom Barkhuizen score in Preston's 2-0 win over Brentford to move the Lilywhites into the play-off places.
results.shortTitle: Preston beat Bees to move into play-offs
results.title: Preston North End 2-0 Brentford: Sean Maguire and Tom Barkhuizen score in win for Lilywhites

results.description: Danish Superliga side FC Midtjylland sign Brentford striker Emiliano Marcondes on loan until 31 December.
results.title: Emiliano Marcondes: FC Midtjylland sign Brentford striker on loan

results.description: AFC Wimbledon sign Brentford striker Marcus Forss, Brighton midfielder Max Sanders and Rochdale defender Ryan Delaney on loan.
results.title: Marcus Forss, Ryan Delaney & Max Sanders: AFC Wimbledon sign trio
